name: Ketrania Valenzia Adriaste Uth Viharin VII

journals.name: Journal
journals.text:
2 Hero Point
- 58gp
Norik Luke
Varis Andi
Vinny Joseph

Gear:
- Breastplate (equipped)
- Steel shield reinforced (equipped)
- Leder rüstung mit wappen der lizardpeople
- Medicine Kit (equipped)
- 3 poison dosen
- 1 healing potion minor (1d8)
- Potion of Waterbreathing (1 hour)
- Potion of Darkvision (1 hour)
- Light barding (horse ac +1)

Wir kriegen nächstes mal loot
Kansaldi war Knight of Solamnia, irgendwas ist vorgefallen und sie hat die Ritter verlassen. Sie war immer fähig aber hatte sehr andere Ansichten.

Soldaten haben menschlichen Hobgoblin trainer gefunden und getötet. Er hatte einen Brief dabei, "die Hochmeisterin braucht Soldaten, kein Schläger"

journals.name: Enemy Tactics Log
journals.text:
Dragonborn?: can glide

yellow fat dragon soldier: werden zu stein und schwert bleibt stecken. Haben energie potential für rage oder ähnliches, staub.

Red dragon soldier: use crossbows and poison, cannot be off-guard for some reason, reflex high, higher intelligence, zerfällt zu poison?

Dragon soldier with Trident: Magical abilities, explodes

Baccaris Son': Feints und attacks mit extra damage if feint success

Goblin: shortbows, swords, no offensive abilities

Hobgoblin: died before analysis was possible

tactics.name: FORM UP!
tactics.description: You signal your team to move into position together. Signal all squadmates affected by your commander’s banner; each can immediately Stride as a reaction, though each must end their movement inside your banner’s aura.

tactics.name: Defensive Retreat
tactics.description: You call for a careful retreat. Signal all squadmates who can hear or see your signal; each can immediately Step up to three times as a free action. Each Step must take them farther away from at least one hostile creature they are observing, and can only take them closer to a hostile creature if doing so is the only way for them to move towards safety (such as if they’re surrounded).

tactics.name: End it
tactics.description:
Requirements You and your allies currently outnumber enemies on the battlefield and you or a squadmate have reduced an enemy to 0 Hit Points since the start of your last turn.
At your proclamation that victory is already at hand, your allies march forward with an authoritative stomp, scattering your enemies in terror. Signal all squadmates affected by your commander’s banner; you and each ally can Step directly toward a hostile creature they are observing as a free action. Any hostile creatures within 10 feet of you or a squadmate after this movement must attempt a Will save against your class DC; on a failure they become fleeing for 1 round and on a critical failure they become fleeing for 1 round and frightened 2. This is an emotion, fear, and mental effect.

tactics.name: Pincer Attack
tactics.description: You signal an aggressive formation designed to exploit enemies’ vulnerabilities. Signal all squadmates affected by your commander’s banner; each can Step as a free action. If any of your allies end this movement adjacent to an opponent, that opponent is off-guard to melee attacks from you and all other squadmates who responded to Pincer Attack until the start of your next turn.
